name: own-property-proxy
description: A small utility to get/set object's own property, if object has no required property, it complains loudly

scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-browser && npm run build-browser-min
scripts.build-browser: parcel build index.js -t browser --no-minify -o own-property-proxy.browser.js --global ownPropertyProxy
scripts.build-browser-min: parcel build index.js -t browser -o own-property-proxy.browser.min.js --global ownPropertyProxy
